title_page__explainer: Embark upon an entrepreneurial odyssey with a few borrowed coins in your pocket and a head full of dreams. Venture out onto the treacherous trade routes of Aggorah to buy, sell, profit, and invest. Build your one-person trading business into a mercantile juggernaut and save enough to retire before luck and time run out.
title_page__saved_game_modal__no_results: You have no local saves currently. Please start a new game.
game_tabs__bank_title: Deposit or withdraw money. Take out a loan.
game_tabs__tools_title: Use upgrades to get more inventory space and specialized tools.
game_tabs__guild_title: Each town has its own mercantile guild. Membership has privileges.
game_tabs__travel_title: Pack up your wares and head off to another town or village to do business.
location__oskah__description: Having grown up on the mean streets of Oskah, you know just how violent this place can be. It's not uncommon for hapless travelers to become lost in its half-lit maze of alleyways and find a clawed hand reaching out from a darkened corner, dragging them to an unknown fate. Though the people here may be simple and rough, they know a good value when they see one.
location__tabbith__description: Far from the hustle and the bustle of the larger cities of Aggorah, Tabbith moves at a slower pace, like wind-blown undulation of the fields of wheat that surround this small rural village. The people here cannot conceive of traveling somewhere else for trade or better prospects. This is their home. Tabbith, quiet and true.
location__butre__description: Now that this port city has solved its long-standing bat problem, Butre's economy is bouncing back. The busy sea traffic attracts peddlers from all over the region, so you may be able to find items here not available elsewhere. Be on your guard, though, because Butre's market stalls are chock-a-block with tricksters and scoundrels.
location__luci__description: As soon as you arrive here, it becomes clear that something is not quite right with Luci. Dark secrets abound in this place like the purple and green gasses escaping from various doorways. The people here seem kind, but many of them shiver uncontrollably even in the summer. It's best not to linger too long in Luci.
location__clionne__description: Known as the jewel of Aggorah, Clionne gleams like a diamond above the lemon-grass pains. Its immaculate brick-lined streets are brimming with shops and customers hungry for your wares. But be careful, Clionne is as deadly as it is beautiful. Your fellow merchants will do their best to fleece you for your fleeces.
items__potat__description: The humble tuber is a key foot staple in Aggorah. They are most valuable early in the year.
items__apple__description: Apples are easy to come by in most areas. Some fancy cities go gaga over them, especially in the off season.
items__hotsauce__description: This tiny bottle packs a big punch. The stuff is so hot that consuming more than a drop will cause you to question all your life's decisions. Customers in the east may pay more for it.
items__saltlick__description: Just a block of salt. Got a deer? Put this out and they'll saunter by and lick on it. Salt lick.
items__oskahtea__description: Some cities have their own custom tea blend. Oskah's blend is, well, interesting. While it tastes fine, it looks like dirty water.
items__tunic__description: Everyone who's anyone is rocking this year's hottest fashion trend: peasant chic. Your customers will be the envy of everyone in this smart pre-stained tunic.
items__wool__description: While relatively common, this type of wool is amazingly useful. Your customers can process it and make any number of things with it.
items__cinnamon__description: Among the more popular spices, cinnamon improves almost any dish.
items__cozytea__description: After a busy day, there's nothing better than a relaxing cup of Cozy Cottage Tea. So cozy.
items__rings__description: Just a random grab bag of rings. Probably not worth very much.
items__glass__description: Such delicate glass figurines are very rare and, presumably, quite valuable.
items__nutmeg__description: What can we say? Peg is a bit of a hoarder and loves nutmeg in large quantities. No need to beg. Peg's nutmeg is sold by the keg.
items__lamp__description: The lamp's curved shape would imply that it's the type you can rub to receive three wishes, but the bold disclaimer on the side states that this is not the case. It's just a lamp.
items__melange__description: Paul likes his food hot and spicy. His spice blend is guaranteed to make your eyes water (then turn blue) after which you may or may not be able to see the future.
items__sporty__description: Made from a variety of herbs and legumes, Spore Tea Spice tastes exactly the way you would expect based on that description.
items__ginger__description: While it looks like any other ginger, this is clearly a bootleg brand of the stuff. You might get a good price from someone who doesn't know what real ginger tastes like.
items__jolt__description: The caffeine boost in this tea blend is enough to get you moving in the morning. At least, I hope it's caffeine. There's no telling what's in this stuff.
items__cinnamonroll__description: You will have lines around the block trying to get their hands on these rolls. People cannot get enough of them.
items__processedwool__description: This wool has been combed and cleaned and is ready to be dyed and spun.
items__silverspoon__description: It's more than a fancy eating utensil. Rich kids like to stick them in their mouths to demonstrate how rich they are, truly a luxury item.
items__rug__description: The craftsmanship that went into the weaving of this rug is very impressive. The colors flow through the rug like they are alive.
items__pepper__description: Just a regular brand of pepper that is in no way affiliated with a group of musicians that have not yet been born. Nothing to see here.
items__secretspice__description: The exact nature of this delicious blend of roughly a dozen herbs and spices is a matter of great secrecy for the chicken restaurant that created it. In fact, you already know too much.
items__fish__description: Some cultures dry or smoke fish to help preserve it and add flavor. I don't know, though. It looks and smells like bait to me.
items__brochure__description: There are at least three things to do in Winnie, according to this brochure. Not terribly useful, but someone in a faraway city may be impressed with an artifact such as this.
items__statuette__description: This statuette of a regional warlord depicts his might and majesty. Also, if you bop him on the top of his tiny head, it wobbles around for a moment. Very amusing.
items__paperlantern__description: When a candle is placed in this light paper contraption, it floats away on a current of air. Quite a party trick.
items__silkkimono__description: So fancy. A silk kimono is just about the fanciest thing one can fancy.
items__vase__description: This relic of a glorious past is perfect in nearly every way. Your customers will love it- and accidentally smash the delicate item moments after getting it home.
market__buy__qty_modal__explainer: Max quantity: {maxQty} based on available cash and storage capacity.
market__sell__qty_modal__explainer: Max quantity: {maxQty} based on the items in your inventory.
bank__savings__explainer: Deposit your cash in the back to prevent heavy losses if you get robbed on the road. All banks are on the same network, so you can deposit cash here and withdraw it somewhere else if you like.
bank__loans__explainer: Taking out a loan can be a great way to build your operation quickly. Each area has its own loan program, so you can take one out in each city if you want. Be sure to pay it back on time or people in town won't want to do business with you.
bank__amount_modal__explainer__deposit: Based on your available cash, you can deposit as much as ⌾{maxAmt}.
bank__amount_modal__explainer__withdrawa: Based on your available savings, you can withdraw as much as ⌾{maxAmt}.
bank__amount_modal__explainer__loanpayme: Based on your available cash, you can apply as much as ⌾{maxAmt} to your loan.
bank__loans__offer__text5: to pay it back. Don't be late!
loans__loan_expired_warning_description: Some time ago, you took out a loan here in {location} and have not paid it back. The loan has come due, so until you go to the bank here and pay back the loan, the local merchants will not do business with you.
guild__explainer: Each town has a guild that you can join- for a fee, of course. Membership can get you reduced prices on certain items, and you can access upgrades and loans that are not available to non-guild members. Join them all and reap the rewards!
guild__member: You are currently a member of this local guild and eligible for its benefits.
guild__memberships_list__none: You have no Guild memberships currently.
guild__local_benefits__cta: All of these benefits can be yours for a reasonable price.
travel__explainer: Select a location on the map below to travel. Each section of the route represents one day of travel. Be careful, dangers abound on the road.
travel__modal__danger__none: An uneventful day. You travel safely down the road on your way to your destination.
travel__modal__danger__bandits: Bandits attack! The pesky bandits have stolen some of your cash and your inventory.
travel__modal__danger__rockSlide: Rock slide! Your progress is impeded and you lose X days in your journey.
travel__modal__danger__flood: The road is flooded, greatly slowing your progress. This is going to cost you time.
travel__modal__danger__wolves: Wolves! A pack of hungry, ferocious wolves surround you and attack. You're lucky to have survived.
travel__modal__danger__tricksters: Those strangers you met on the road seemed nice, but now some of your things are missing. They may have been thieves.
travel__modal__danger__bandits_avoided: A gang of bandits appear, demanding your money and valuables. You brandish your prop dagger, and rather than shake in fear they laugh heartily, leaving you unharmed. They take the dagger, though, out of concern that you may hurt yourself with it.
travel__modal__danger__rockSlide_avoided: A sudden rock slide shakes the valley. Deploying your fancy bronze umbrella, the stones bounce harmlessly away. The umbrella is dented horribly now and utterly useless. You may need to get another one.
travel__modal__danger__flood_avoided: The clouds open up and rain floods the road and surrounding land. Thanks to your water wings, you and your belongings float to safety. As soon as the water clears, your lovely water wings float away.
travel__modal__danger__wolves_avoided: Suddenly you find yourself surrounded by a pack of ravenous wolves. Thinking fast, you toss them the package of stinky meat and they dive on it instantly, allowing you to escape. As you depart, over your shoulder you can see them playing and frolicking like puppies. That's nice.
travel__modal__danger__tricksters_avoide: You come upon a group of fast-talking charlatans who nearly convince you to buy a timeshare in Clionne when they notice your book of travel tips, believing it to be a rare book of ancient knowledge. They pick it from your pocket and walk away laughing, stealing nothing from you.
travel__modal__danger__effect__cash__sm: You have lost a small amount of money (if you still have any).
travel__modal__danger__effect__cash__md: You have lost a moderate amount of money (if you still have any).
travel__modal__danger__effect__cash__lg: You have lost a great deal of money (if you still have any).
travel__modal__danger__effect__inventory: You have lost a small portion of your inventory.
You have lost a moderate portion of your inventory.
You have lost a major portion of your inventory.
upgrades__capacity_1__description: This handy-dandy backpack will slightly expand your ability to carry items around.
upgrades__capacity_2__description: Looking inside this two-strapped behemoth, you would swear it's bigger on the inside than it looks on the outside.
upgrades__capacity_3__description: That's a nice looking cart. You can carry so much stuff in there!
upgrades__capacity_4__description: Much like the small cart, but as its name implies, this version is much larger.
upgrades__map_1__description: This new map includes 2 more cities: Luci and Clionne.
upgrades__map_2__description: This new map includes 2 faraway cities: Tigi and Winnie.
upgrades__counterDanger__bandits__descri: By no means a real weapon, this flimsy prop could scare away would-be attackers on your travels.
upgrades__counterDanger__flood__descript: Tired of all those flash floods ruining your day while traveling? These water wings will help float you to safety. This is a one-time use item.
upgrades__counterDanger__rockSlide__desc: While this metal dome is far too bulky and heavy to useful for keeping the sun and rain off of you, it may have other uses.
upgrades__counterDanger__wolves__descrip: One sniff and it's clear that this is not an item you plan to eat, but it could be useful for keeping animals, or humans with no sense of smell or taste, at bay.
upgrades__counterDanger__tricksters__des: The small volume of traveling safety tips is mostly filled with things you already know: don't listen to grifters, be careful around strangers and such.
how_to__play__content_1: As a peddler on the Spice Road, your goal is to buy and sell items at various markets, earning a profit as you leverage differences in prices at the various spots to build your peddling business into a one-person mercantile empire.
how_to__play__content_2: It's up to you to build your fortune and save enough for retirement, so don't waste a day. Time moves a little slower in the 13th century. Each turn is 1 day. What you choose to do with it, whether that's buying or selling something or stowing away money at the bank, that's entirely up to you. If you choose to travel to another market, that can take multiple days.
how_to__play__content_3: Keep your eyes open for profit opportunities. In addition to price differences between cities, prices will fluctuate sightly over time in each local market. Some items are seasonal, so selling an item out of season can fetch a handsome return.
how_to__buy_sell__content_1: Click on the Market tab to see which items are on offer in this location. Bear in mind that not all items are available for sale or purchase at every market, so keep track of the prices as you travel from place to place. Great opportunities may be hidden in tiny details.
how_to__buy_sell__content_2: Click on the Buy tab to purchase items or the Sell tab to offer items from your inventory at the going rate for that market. Each item will have a name, price and the quantity of product on hand. How much you can buy depends on your available cash as well as your carrying capacity. Keep track of your used and available capacity, both weight and volume. After making some money, you may be able to afford an upgrade or two that will increase your capacity. If you want to purchase the maximum allowable amount, click the Max button if it is available.
how_to__buy_sell__content_3: To sell an item, click on your Inventory to check through your items and see what price others may be willing to pay. You can enter the quantity to sell or click the Max button to sell everything.
how_to__travel__content_1: To monetize the price differentials between areas, you'll need to do some traveling. Click the Travel button to open a map of the available locations. As you advance in prominence and wealth, you may have an opportunity to purchase upgraded maps that give you access to new cities. Some cities are close by and may only take 1 or 2 days of travel. Others may be further apart. Often, but not always, these far-flung locations have wider price disparities and, consequently, more opportunity for profit.
how_to__travel__content_2: Travel can be dangerous, even between locations that are not very far apart. For each day of travel, you roll for a chance encounter. If you roll high, you have an uneventful travel day. On the other hand, a low roll could lead to a bandit attack or rock slide. Depending on the calamity you face, you could lose a portion of your cash, some of your inventory, or delay you for several days. As your business grows, you can invest in spendable upgrades in the Tools section that can help you escape these dangers as they arise.
how_to__banking__content_1: Each location you visit will have a branch of the main Spice Road Bank where you can store your money for use later and take out or repay loans. Saving money helps prevent large losses when you encounter bandits or charlatans on the road while traveling. Since each branch is connected via couriers and carrier pigeons, they operate as a single entity. So, you can deposit money in one city and withdraw it again in another.
how_to__banking__content_2: Loans are a great way to kick-start a thriving business on the Spice Road. As you might imagine, though, this kind of financial boost comes at a cost. The fee for each loan is added to the principle from the start, and you have a set amount of time to pay it back. If you miss the due date, bad things happen, so do not miss the due date. Also, all loans count against your net wealth. At the end of your limited time on the Spice Road, you want enough net wealth to retire comfortably, and you can't do that with a bunch of outstanding loans.
how_to__guilds__content_1: As your travels on the Spice Road allow you to gather a small fortune, you may be ready to jump to the next step in your journey to a happy retirement. Now a thriving entrepreneur, you will have an opportunity to rise to the ranks of the elite mercantile guilds. Each city or village has its own guild with their own specialties and interests.
how_to__guilds__content_2: By paying the entry fee, you may have access to special discounts on certain items. For tools and upgrades, some items may be marked “guild only” so you can only purchase them by joining the ranks of the mercantile elite for that area. Now that you're well on your way to the highest strata of power and affluence, it's time to throw off your dusty peddler's coat in exchange for a suit of the finest silk. Join a guild today!
